workExperience.description: Worked as a member of a small team that designed and developed new features in a rapid product development cycle with React/Typescript. Worked in React/Typescript to build new features for public safety data collection and dissemination tools.

Worked in GatsbyJS and Contentful CMS to add content and features to sites for clients. Worked independently with clients as necessary to implement features and content changes Dramatically improved site performance and UX in several sites by implementing CSS solutions in place of existing JavaScript-based animations.

photo.altText: Image of Anthony standing in the Scottish Highlands wearing a black beanie and a smirk.

bio.professionalBlurb: Hi, I'm Anthony! I'm a web developer based in Boulder, Colorado. I love collaborative environments, novel problems, and learning about new technologies. While I have worked as a full-stack developer, I find working in the front-end to be where I thrive. I use React and Node to make functional sites and applications.
bio.personalBlurb: When I'm not writing code, you can find me climbing indoors or out, listening to music, reading, watching a show, gaming, cooking, riding a bike, or hanging out at the cafe. I love talking over shared interests, and hearing about what makes other people tick.
